fi.hu.cs.titokone
Class CompileDebugger

java.lang.Object
  fi.hu.cs.titokone.CompileDebugger
public class CompileDebugger
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used by compiler when it compiles code. For each line compiled compiler asks CompileDebugger to create a CompileInfo object and passes it to the GUIBrain.

Constructor Summary

          This is the only constructor for CompileDebugger.

foundEQU

public void foundEQU(java.lang.String name,
                     int value)
This method tells that an EQU was found and it is added to the symboltable.

Parameters:
name - String containing name of the symbol.
value - Int containing the value.

public void foundDS(java.lang.String name,
                    int value)
This method tells debugger that a DS compiler instruction was found and it is added to the symboltable.

Parameters:

value - Int containing the value.

reserveDS

public void reserveDS(java.lang.String name,
                      int size,
                      int ADDR)
This method tells where data area for given DS is in the memory. This method is used when compiles has checked all lines in the first phase and has called firstPhase() method. This method sets definingDS field in CompileInfo to true and then sets corresponding fields.

Parameters:
name - String containing name of the symbol.
size - Int containing the size of DS
ADDR - Starting address of the segment..

foundDC

public void foundDC(java.lang.String name,
                    boolean isNew)
This method tells debugger that a DC compiler instruction was found and it is added to the symboltable.

Parameters:
name - String containing name of the symbol.
isNew - Boolean containing information if the DC is new or is it already in symboltable..

reserveDC

public void reserveDC(java.lang.String name,
                      int value,
                      int ADDR)
This method tells where given DC is located in the memory. This method is used when compiles has checked all lines in the first phase and has called firstPhase() method. This method sets definingDC field in CompileInfo to true and then sets corresponding fields.

Parameters:
name - String containing name of the symbol.
value - Int containing the value.
ADDR - Address of the DC.

isNew - Boolean containing the information if the symbol was new..

THis Method tells debugger that a known symbol was found and it's value is given as a paratmeter.

Parameters:
name - String containing name of the symbol.
value - Int containing the value.

foundLabel

public void foundLabel(java.lang.String name,
                       boolean isNew)
This method tells that a label was found and it is added to the symboltable. Boolean new tells debugger that if it was new.

Parameters:
name - String containing name of the symbol.
isNew - Boolean containing the onformation if the symbol was new.

foundLabel

public void foundLabel(java.lang.String name,
                       int lineNumber,
                       boolean isNew)
This method tells that for given label points to given line.

Parameters:
name - String containing name of the symbol.
lineNumber - Int containing the linenumber of the label.
isNew - Boolean containing the information if the label was new.

foundDEF

public void foundDEF(java.lang.String name,
                     java.lang.String value)
This method tells that a DEF was found and it is added to the symboltable.

Parameters:
name - String containing name of the symbol.
value - String containing the value.

firstPhase

public void firstPhase(int lineNumber,
                       boolean lineEmpty)
This method tells debugger that first round of compilation is in progress and the line compiled is empty. It creates CompileInfo-object and sets its phase to 1 and lineEmpty to true.

Parameters:
lineNumber - Number of the compiled line.
lineEmpty - True if line was empty.

firstPhase

public void firstPhase(int lineNumber,
                       java.lang.String lineContents)
This method tells debugger that first round of compilation is in progres and line wasn't empty. It creates CompileInfo object and sets its phase to 1, lineNumber and lineContents fields.

Parameters:
lineNumber - Number of the compiled line.
lineContents - String containing the symbolic command.

firstPhase

public void firstPhase()
This method is used when all lines are checked in the first phase of compilation and compiler is setting symbols and labels.

finalFirstPhase

public void finalFirstPhase(java.lang.String[] codeArea,
                            java.lang.Integer[] dataArea)
This method is used when all DC and DS are defined and compiler is ready to move to the second phase. Compiler tells debugger what are actual code lines and then what is dataArea in memory and what it contains. GUIBrain then redraws GUI and writes codelines leaving binary cells empty. Then it draws data area where number of first data line is i+codeArea.length

Parameters:
codeArea - String array containing codelines.
dataArea - Integer array containing data, or nulls where the data has no values.

secondPhase

public void secondPhase(int lineNumber,
                        java.lang.String lineContents,
                        int binary,
                        java.lang.String IR)
This method tells debugger that the second round of compilation is in progress. It creates CompileInfo object and sets its phase to 3, lineContents and binary fields. It also creates a local comment and the IR is !!!KATENOIDAAN!!! after it.

Parameters:
lineNumber - number of the compiled line.
lineContents - Contents of the line.
binary - Line as a binary (presented as an integer).
IR - String containing binary command splitted into parts which are presented as integers.

finalPhase

public void finalPhase()
This method tells debugger that final phase of compilation is in progress. It creates CompileInfo object and sets its phase to 4.

setInitPointers

public void setInitPointers(int sp,
                            int fp)
This method sets the initial values of SP and FP.

Parameters:
sp - Value of the SP,
fp - Value of the FP.

setMemoryline

public void setMemoryline(int[][] lines)
This method sets given memorylines to the given values. It is used in the finalizing first phase of compilation. Compiler uses it to tell GUIBrain

Parameters:
lines - An int array where first cell is linenumber and second is the new value.

lineCompiled

public CompileInfo lineCompiled()
This method returns the created CompileInfo-object. It sets comments in the CompileInfo and then returns it.
